QuestData.Title: Animal Services
QuestData.Description: Kodos are resilient creatures. With some food, the big guy may come around.$B$BThe Razormane have stolen plenty of grain from previous caravans. You can gather up stolen grain from the nearby camps.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 5 sacks of Stolen Grain from the Razormane camps on Thorn Hill.
QuestData.CompletionText: The creature doesn't lift its head, but looks at you imploringly with large, watery eyes.
QuestData.RewardText: The Kodo is voracious! You might as well be pouring those sacks of grain into a hole!$B$BAlready the animal is beginning to perk up.
